word: OVER SIXTY YEARS AGO, IN REFERRING TO THE RECENT EUROPEAN CONFLICT IN A SPECIAL TESTIMONY, SISTER WHITE SAID, "I saw Europe just as things were moving to accomplish their desire. There would seemingly be a slackening up once or twice, thus the hearts of the wicked would be relieved and hardened, but the work would not settle down, only seem to, for the minds of kings and rulers were intent upon over-throwing each other, and minds of the people to get the ascendency."
